name: virgo
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a young woman: Jupiter lies in the constellation Virgo the Maiden.
[ C or U ] the sixth sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 23 August to 22 September , represented by a young woman, or a person born during this period: My star sign is Virgo. Paul is a Virgo.
More examplesFewer examplesSpica is the brightest star in the constellation Virgo. M87 is a giant elliptical galaxy in the Virgo cluster. If you're a typical Virgo, you don't trust to luck but to your own efforts.Virgos like to look after people, but they sometimes interfere.

the sixth sign of the zodiac, covering the period August 23 to September 22 and represented by a young woman, or a person born during this period
